summary: Mordin - Nightblade lvl 47 male dumner. Focus on illusion, destruction, sneak, one handed and archery.
descriptionHtml: Mordin - Nightblade lvl 47 male dumner. Focus on illusion, destruction, sneak, one handed and archery. Fus ro obtained, dawnguard questline started, but not completed. Same for College of Winterhold and Dark Brotherhood. I recommend the mod Midas Magic, because Mordin know a lot of those spells
author: Pyssyna
